title: SPY LOCK STEADY SYSTEM - TOUCH THE BUTTON
description: SPY is HAPPY to unveil its Lock Steady™ lens changing system—the quickest, easiest fingerprint-free lens change system on the market. Launching on the Doom frame—the most technologically advanced snow goggle yet—Lock Steady™ quick-change lens system is a breakthrough in lens changing simplicity, helping you readily adapt to the unpredictable moods of Mother Nature so you never waste time or miss a line. Just touch the button.
